page.title: 15Our Homes
page.content: This page is about two people's homes; one in the country and one on an estate. I (Joelle) live right out in the country.We live in Natton.We are building an extension.When it is finished we will have 13 rooms.Our house is called Vine Cottage.While my dad was building our house we lived in a chalet which had 3 rooms.We live near a disused Baptist graveyard, and at the very end of a country lane. My home (Linzi's)is a bungalow.We live in Northway near Tewkesbury.When we first moved in a man lived there with 4 afghan hounds.We have 6 rooms. They are a bathroom,3 bedrooms,1 lounge (which we had an extension built on) and 1 kitchen (which was 2 rooms). Before we moved in and before the man before us moved in,the site of our house was a farm.There is still a cornfield and a farm nearby.
